summary: This document is a Vietnamese Communist analysis of the effects of increased U.S. military aid to the Government of Vietnam, written in early May 1962 by a VC company commander in Ba Xuyen Province.
title: Vietnamese Communist Analysis of Effects
recipient: STATE, ARMY, NAVY, AIR, JCS, SECDEF, NSA, NIC, USIA, OCI, ONE, OCR, ORR, AID, DIA
